actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate the third week in April each year as "National Private Property Week".

summary.text: Designates the third week in April of each year as "National Private Property Week." Directs the President of the United States to issue a proclamation calling for appropriate observance of such week.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate the third week in April each year as "National Private Property Week".
